document.full_text: toney douglas shot a sparkling 29-point haul off the bench to help the new york knicks set a franchise record for three-pointers in their 120-99 rout of the memphis grizzlies on thursday.
document.title: douglas fires knicks to 3-pt record in grizzlies
lines_and_colors: toney douglas shot a sparkling 29-point haul off the bench to help the new york knicks set a franchise record for three-pointers in their 120-99 rout of the memphis grizzlies on thursday.
